<title level="1" pfs="">[Hantu Belian](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1397)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The hantu belian represents the spiritual essence of a tiger and typically manifests as a ghostly bird perched on a tiger's back. Hantu belians commit acts of great destruction as well as restoration. They sometimes possess humanoids to cause great discord and devastation, though their intentions are typically borne of amusement or boredom rather than malice.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 30

**[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Hantu_Belian.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Hantu Belian](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1397)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
<trait label="Hantu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=377" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=222" />
<trait label="Spirit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=149" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 85</row>

**Perception** +24; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +23, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +6

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +7
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +24 

</row>

**HP** 150

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
all damage 10 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) or [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

**Unrest Aura** ([emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) 30 feet. A creature that enters the emanation must attempt a DC 27 Will save. On a failure, the creature is [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) until the end of its next turn (1 minute on a critical failure). During this confusion, the creature attempts to cause turmoil, using its actions to create disarray in its general vicinity by throwing around objects or scaring passersby. A creature that succeeds at its save is immune to all hantu belians' unrest auras for 1 hour. A hantu belian can suppress or resume the effects of this aura as an action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d6+13 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +22 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+13 piercing

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 30, attack +22
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **3rd**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Remove Disease](/Spells.aspx?ID=251)
- **4th**
[Remove Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=250)
- **6th**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
- **7th**
[Possession](/Spells.aspx?ID=225)

**Greater Possession**   A hantu belian can use its [possession](/Traits.aspx?ID=129) innate spell to possess a creature for up to 1 hour rather than 1 minute. While possessing a creature, the hantu uses its own [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1), [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3), and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) modifiers unless those of the possessed creature are higher.

</column>
